data.title: Reading and Literature
data.meta_description:
Reading and Literature Studies Unit
Expectations
We are going to explore how to read for meaning.  We will look at different text forms and style elements. We will also work on building vocabulary. Finally, we are going to reflect on the skills and strategies you have, and have developed in this
data.text:
World Literature - The Chaotic Age

In the appendix to Harold Bloom's The Western Canon, Bloom lists his favourite writers, and sorts them by geographic location. This is a list from what Bloom calls The Chaotic Age (20th Century and onwards).

My copy of this list has gone missing, but Robert Teeter has recreated one. This is a copy of Mr. Teeter's list.
